those having issues with updating movie info from the internet, here's a fix i read on another website.

editing hosts file to:
127.0.0.1 http://www.binaryworks.it	www.binaryworks.it	binaryworks.it
127.0.0.1 http://www.binaryworks.it/extrememoviemanager	www.binaryworks.it/extrememoviemanager	binaryworks.it/extrememoviemanager
mate i couldnt even get it to unpack. 00 files  something missing

The solution for using it online works perfectly for all editions of this.


Also I am looking for a solution to the GDI+ error, but for now i found a way to avoid it.  Do NOTHING with a video if when single-left-clicking on it shows the poster/cover image for it as an all black box with a red X in the top left corner.  All other videos will work perfectly without any errors.
